column4: You don't know how many freaking hours we have googled to fix our stuff.  Sometimes you have to suck it up and research
fortunatly I have good hardware, and so I haven't  needed to Google to find out how to configure stuff.   Also I was asking someone something in particular, something I didn't even know about before.
You wouldn't believe what comes up on the Google for your issues.  Yeah, it takes a long time, but you'll eventually find your solutions
I have used Google for  searching for stuff before, but of course,  and yes it can be rather useless at times  with not exactly the correct keywords
